title: 6 Healthy Ways to Heal and Move On From Heartbreak
description: In this episode of On Purpose, I’m discussing healthy ways to deal with heartbreak. I share how you need to feel before you heal, why you should never define your self worth by how someone treats you and how to stop looking at love as a noun and start treating it as a verb. I know heartbreak is one of the worst pains you can feel so I hope these tips can help you healthily heal.
author: onpurposepodcast@jayshetty.me (Jay Shetty)
